items.description: Small, tasty berries.
items.effect: No effect.

items.description: Rich in antioxidants.
items.effect: Adjacent berries give x2.

items.description: Bright and sweet berries.
items.effect: Adjacent berries give +1.

items.description: Green foliage from various plants.
items.effect: Gives +1 for each turn. 10% chance to be destroyed.

items.description: Small branches broken off from trees.
items.effect: Gives +1 for each adjacent item that isn't the same.

items.description: The outer protective layer of a tree trunk.
items.effect: Destroys itself after 3 turns. Gives 10 gold.

items.description: A delicate blue flower often found in fields.
items.effect: Interest x5 after 5 turns.

items.description: A type of mushroom with a milky substance when cut.
items.effect: 25% chance to make adjacent item worth zero. Maximum once per turn.

items.description: A stone with a pointed or jagged edge.
items.effect: Gives +3 for each adjacent rock.

items.description: Bright yellow or orange flowers with a distinct smell.
items.effect: 10% chance to x5 sell price.

items.description: The sticky fluid that flows in trees.
items.effect: No effect.

items.description: A woody stem of a tree.
items.effect: No effect.

items.description: A yellow flower with fluffy seeds.
items.effect: Exchanges all your money and either doubles it or halves it.

items.description: A type of cactus with edible fruit.
items.effect: Destroys all adjacent items and x5 their value.

items.description: A colorful flower often used in medicine.
items.effect: 25% chance to create adjacent poppy.

items.description: Grass that has dried out, often found in arid regions.
items.effect: No effect.

items.description: A hard, sedimentary rock used for making sparks.
items.effect: Gives x? where ? is adjacent empty slots.

items.description: A small fragment of gold.
items.effect: All adjacent items give x2 gold.

items.description: Hard skeletal remains of animals.
items.effect: Destroys adjacent flowers, gets +1 for each flower destroyed.

items.description: Large leaves from palm trees.
items.effect: No effect.

items.description: Citrus-colored berries with a tangy flavor.
items.effect: All berries give +1 for each other berry.

items.description: A conifer cone containing seeds.
items.effect: No effect.

items.description: Black residue from partially burned wood.
items.effect: No effect.

items.description: A vibrant flower that blooms for a single day.
items.effect: Gives you +1 money for each 10 gold you have.

items.description: Fossilized tree resin often containing insects.
items.effect: This item will get +1 or -1 x number of turns randomly each turn. Can't take money.

items.description: Soft, green plant growth found on trees and rocks.
items.effect: Swaps interest and sell value each turn.

items.description: Deep purple berries with a sweet taste.
items.effect: Gives x2 when in a corner.

items.description: A prickly plant with purple or pink flowers.
items.effect: Gives x4 when in the center.

items.description: A delicate flower with spurred petals.
items.effect: 50% chance to give a reroll token.

items.description: Underground parts of plants that absorb water and nutrients.
items.effect: Gives x3 when in the bottom row.

items.description: A fuzzy-leaved plant often used in herbal remedies.
items.effect: Randomly moves items.

items.description: Small, smooth stones found near water bodies.
items.effect: Gives x2 interest if there is a tree, rock and flower in your board.

items.description: Berries that emit a faint glow in the dark.
items.effect: Replaces random item with berry.

items.description: A golden-hued mushroom with a pleasant aroma.
items.effect: x2 sell price for adjacent items.

items.description: A shimmering fragment from a precious stone.
items.effect: All minerals get +1 interest.

items.description: A dark, glassy rock formed from volcanic lava.
items.effect: All items get x?/2 interest where ? is empty slots.

items.description: A meaty, flavorful mushroom prized in culinary arts.
items.effect: 5% chance to convert adjacent to higher tier.

items.description: The nut of an oak, containing a single seed.
items.effect: Interest is equal to amount of tree items.
x2 Interest in right-hand column.

items.description: A fragrant herb commonly used in cooking and beverages.
items.effect: x2 Sell price in left-hand column.

items.description: A sharp, calcified structure embedded in the jawbone.
items.effect: Interest is -1. Grants +5 gold every 3 turns.
Interest is -1. Grants +3 gold every 2 turns.
25% chance to convert adjacent rocks to poppies.
Gets +1 sell price each turn. 1% chance to be destroyed.
5% chance to give +1 interest and sell price.

items.description: An aromatic herb with small green leaves used in cooking.
items.effect: Sell price +1 when any item is added.

items.description: A fragrant shrub with purple flowers.
items.effect: Interest +1 when any item is destroyed.

items.description: A stone with a polished surface.
items.effect: Converts all berries to sharp rocks.

items.description: A bright yellow flower with glossy petals.
items.effect: Gains +1 interest every 5 turns.

items.description: A poisonous mushroom with distinctive red caps covered in white spots.
items.effect: Destroys all adjacent items and +5 to its own interest.
